Content: There is a parallel to draw between ZIM and SWA which years ago had that fixed dollar long term fuel cost contract that propelled the company from a low budget carrier into a the major carrier that they are today.  Right now ZIM has ship leases locked in at advantageous low historical prices compared to today's market value.  At the same time
Author: per container rates remain sky high (at a time of the year that is perennially a low profit time for shippers).
